statements: SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM UserBehavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_type IN ('view', 'like');
SELECT id, interaction_data FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT id, user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM UserBehavior WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY id LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, user_id, behavior_type, timestamp, interaction_data FROM UserBehavior WHERE interaction_data ->> 'action' = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, behavior_type, timestamp, interaction_data FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 456 AND behavior_type IN ('click','scroll') ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_id > 10 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users JOIN user_interactions ON users.user_id = user_interactions.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT COUNT(user_id), interaction_type FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY COUNT(user_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT username, email FROM user_details ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_details WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, page_visited, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ua.activity_id, ud.username, ua.activity_description FROM user_activity ua INNER JOIN user_details ud ON ua.user_id = ud.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(user_id), DATE_PART('year', registration_date) AS registration_year FROM user_details GROUP BY DATE_PART('year', registration_date) ORDER BY registration_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT page_name, url FROM pages WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, page_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM pages WHERE page_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, page_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 3 AND activity_type = 'like'
SELECT user_id, page_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE page_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE users.created_at < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT page_id, page_name, url FROM Pages ORDER BY page_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, page_id, interaction_type FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_id = 10;
SELECT purchase_id, interaction_id, purchase_amount FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT Users.username, Pages.page_name FROM Users JOIN Interactions ON Users.user_id = Interactions.user_id JOIN Pages ON Interactions.page_id = Pages.page_id WHERE Users.username LIKE '%john%' AND Pages.url LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT COUNT(interaction_id), AVG(purchase_amount) FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Pages.page_name, COUNT(Clicks.click_id) AS total_clicks FROM Pages LEFT JOIN Interactions ON Pages.page_id = Interactions.page_id LEFT JOIN Clicks ON Interactions.interaction_id = Clicks.interaction_id GROUP BY Pages.page_name ORDER BY total_clicks DESC LIMIT 3;
